member.name: DML_FEATURE_DATA_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_SUPPORT
member.summary: Provides detail about whether a DirectML device supports a particular data type within tensors. See . The query type is , and the support data type is DML_FEATURE_DATA_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_SUPPORT.

member.name: DML_FEATURE_DATA_TENSOR_DATA_TYPE_SUPPORT.IsSupported
member.summary: TRUE if the tensor data type is supported within tensors by the DirectML device. Otherwise, FALSE.
